column1: #Text=Katara says : " Where did you guys get the money to buy all this stuff ? "
#Text=" Katara says : " Ah , so she cheated .
#Text=I only cheated because he was cheating !
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm just saying this is n't something we should make a habit of doing .
#Text=" Katara says : " I do n't hate fun !
#Text=" Aang says : " Katara , I 'll personally make you an Avatar Promise that we wo n't make a habit of doing these scams .
#Text=" Katara says : " Guys , I think these scams have gone far enough .
#Text=If you keep doing them , something bad is gon na happen .
#Text=" Toph says : " Could you for once stop being such a sourpuss and just lighten up ?
#Text=You think I should be more like you ?
#Text=Maybe then you 'd see how great we have it !
#Text=With no parents to tell us what to do !
#Text=You 're acting like this because of your parents .
#Text=" Katara says : " They were controlling over you , so you ran away , and now you act like your parents do n't exist .
#Text=You act like you hate them , but you do n't .
#Text=" Toph says : " I do hate them .
#Text=" Katara says : " I do n't think so .
#Text=I think you miss them , but you just do n't wan na deal with that , so instead you act like this crazy person .
#Text=" Toph says : " Look , I ran away to help Aang !
#Text=These scams put us all at risk , and we do n't need that .
#Text=We 've already got some third - eyed freak after us .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Speaking of that " third - eyed freak " , I think I 've come up with a name for him .
#Text=What do you think of " Sparky - Sparky - Boom Man " ?
#Text=" Katara says : " We have enough money !
#Text=" Toph says : " I 'll stop when I wan na stop and not when you tell me !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Speaking of money , I 'm off to spend some .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hawky , welcome to Team Avatar .
#Text=My name 's Sokka , and I 'm your new owner , and as such I should warn you that there 's already a lemur in our group , so I do n't wan na see any fighting .
